text: Khadija Haouati (خديجة الحوات ; born 5 March 1965) is a Moroccan judoka. She competed at the 1988 Summer Olympics, where judo was for women a demonstration sport, in the half-lightweight event. In the quarter finals she was beaten by French Dominique Brun and in the repechages against Japanese Kaori Yamaguchi. At the 1990 African Judo Championships she won the bronze medal in the -56 kg category. She competed at the 2019 World Championships Veterans. == References == Category:1965 births Category:Judoka Category:Living people Category:Moroccan sportspeople
title: Khadija Haouati
